name: Glowcap Festival
text:
Helping a spore is hardly a chore!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, May 2024.

name: King Krush
text:
If the water in the footprint starts rippling, it’s time to run!

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Whizbang
text: A world of wonderment is only a wish away! Earnable on the Whizbang’s Workshop reward track.

name: 10 Years in the Tavern
text:
Thank you for an incredible decade of escapades!

Acquired by participating in anniversary events.

name: Zail
text:
No one can be as refined as he is, but equipping this will bring you close.

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.
